item.title: @elonmusk: üá≥üá± A Dutch court has sentenced a migrant named Arnold Oforiwaa to 5 years in prison for stabbing his...
item.description: üá≥üá± A Dutch court has sentenced a migrant named Arnold Oforiwaa to 5 years in prison for stabbing his girlfriend 258 times. The prosecutor only asked for 10 years in prison but the judge halved it to 5 years because Arnold was documented ‚Äúto have very low IQ.‚Äù He murdered his ‚Äògirlfriend‚Äô ‚Äî a young mother ‚Äî because she focused too much on caring for her newborn and too little on him. He stabbed her 258 (!) times and filmed the mother as she lay bleeding to death. Afterwards he took selfies with the newborn in its mothers blood.

item.title: @elonmusk: @DataRepublicanis one of the bravest people I know. She was doxxed, has received death threats, and ...
item.description: @DataRepublicanis one of the bravest people I know. She was doxxed, has received death threats, and has faced bomb scares. Yet she pressed forward, documenting exactly how deep the abyss goes. Read this book to see what we saw inside the federal government‚Äîand to find the way to fix it. Edward Coristine, aka ‚ÄúBig Balls‚Äù November 30th, 2025

item.title: @elonmusk: More and more young white men are looking at Britain, how the ENTIRE country operates, and thinking ...
item.description: More and more young white men are looking at Britain, how the ENTIRE country operates, and thinking - why does EVERYBODY ELSE seem to get a helping hand? What have we done wrong? The answer lads, is absolutely nothing. How many young white men have lost out on decent jobs exactly because they are male, and exactly because they are white? Tens and tens of thousands. Likely more. It is institutional and systemic bias against white British men. Anti-white racism is thriving in Britain. Poisonous DEI infects our institutions and corporations. Quotas steal professional opportunities away from bright young men who deserve it. The education system, stacked against you - the forgotten working class white lads who nobody even thinks about, nobody even talks about. Blocked from universities, taught to be ashamed of who you are. The rot MUST end. In the justice system? Who gets the raw end of the deal? Young white men. They tried to implement sentencing guidelines that directly target you, and put you in prison over somebody else for the exact same crime. It is ENDLESS. It seems everyone has a ‚Äòprotected characteristic‚Äô apart from you. Under a Restore Britain Government, it will all end. The woke bullshit will end, I promise you that. You now have a political party that will fight for you. We would tear away all of the vile legislation that has made Britain such a hostile and unwelcoming place to its own young men. Our message is clear. There is NOTHING wrong with being white, and there is NOTHING wrong with being male. You‚Äôre told that you‚Äôre racist for loving your country, chauvinistic for enjoying a few beers at the football, bigoted for having a joke with your mates. It must all end. We must restore confidence to an entire generation of young white men who have been entirely forgotten and let down by the rotten political establishment. My advice is this. Keep working hard, learn a skill, be respectful, have fun, and despite everything - enjoy yourselves. Keep going. It will get better. You now have a political party that properly represents you. Restore Britain.

item.title: @elonmusk: Flashback to July 2022: Elon Musk showing Everyday Astronaut the massive leap from messy Raptor 1 (‚Äò...
item.description: Flashback to July 2022: Elon Musk showing Everyday Astronaut the massive leap from messy Raptor 1 (‚ÄòChristmas tree‚Äô vibes üòÇ) to clean Raptor 2 ‚Äì 230 tons thrust at 300 bar, tons of parts deleted! Fast-forward to 2026: We‚Äôre already on Raptor 3 ‚Äì 280+ tons thrust, even simpler design, no external pipes, in production (100+ built!), testing like crazy, set for Starship V3 flights soon. Insane progress in ~3.5 years!

item.title: @elonmusk: The Spanish police have just announced that the real figure of migrants being ‚Äúnormalized‚Äù under Ped...
item.description: The Spanish police have just announced that the real figure of migrants being ‚Äúnormalized‚Äù under Pedro Sanchez‚Äôs new laws is actually 1.35 MILLION. The government originally lied and said it was 500,000. The later revised it to about 800,000. The police have said the real number is 1.35 MILLION. Please keep in mind this is BEFORE family reunifications are factored into the equation. I think it‚Äôs time to reconsider Spain‚Äôs ability to participate in Schengen and in the US Visa Waiver Program.

item.title: @elonmusk: One year ago (Feb 7, 2025), NASA‚Äôs Curiosity rover stood on Mount Sharp and captured a panoramic vie...
item.description: One year ago (Feb 7, 2025), NASA‚Äôs Curiosity rover stood on Mount Sharp and captured a panoramic view looking down into Gale Crater. Yes, this is Mars, about 140 million miles away.

item.title: @elonmusk: This investigation in California found dead voters, a dog registered to vote and voters with inaccur...
item.description: This investigation in California found dead voters, a dog registered to vote and voters with inaccurate ages up to 125 years old. Thats exactly why Voter ID is necessary in any serious country. Pass The SAVE America Act.

item.title: @elonmusk: Everything I've said about transgenderism for the past 10 years has been absolutely correct and tota...
item.description: Everything I've said about transgenderism for the past 10 years has been absolutely correct and totally vindicated. Now I'm telling you that the trans violence we've seen so far is nothing compared to what's coming if we don't treat trans ideology as a severe public safety hazard and crack down it immediately and aggressively.

item.title: @elonmusk: The civilization that gave the world Beethoven, established the rule of law, built the Sistine Chape...
item.description: The civilization that gave the world Beethoven, established the rule of law, built the Sistine Chapel, and circumnavigated the globe must cast off the shackles of shame and self-doubt. Europe must reverse its decline. Europe must survive.
